Name: That Makes Sense
About the game: That Makes Sense is a puzzle game where you define the rules...yes, like that other game you know. The game takes place on a hex grid, allowing phrases to be formed in interesting patterns, right, left, up, down, compact, diagonal, wandering, branching, meandering. Puzzles can be larger than the screen, use the camera to zoom and pan the puzzle. Puzzles have multiple solutions. Find approaches to create, combine, and change phrases to meet each puzzle's challenges. Test yourself to see if you can solve puzzles in creative ways, beyond the predefined challenges! Gameplay is both familiar and new, making you think in new ways to solve the puzzles. Game takes place on a hex grid, changing how you think about phrases and reusing words Puzzles may be large, use the camera to zoom and pan Multiple challenges in each puzzle, track your progress Find your own unique solutions to the puzzles
